data.name: cherry blossom gif roblox
Particles.js (BetterDiscord)
data.description:
If you enable transparency in Bandaged Better Discord's settings, this will also make the window slightly translucent. Userstyles theme can be installed by grabbing the CSS from stylus extension at discordapp.com and pasting it to betterdiscord's CSS field. This wont add the animation, it requires the plugin below.
My particles.js plugin for BetterDiscord

data.name: Dark Overflow
data.description: A dark theme for Stack Overflow

data.name: More Dark Inverted Mode
data.description: This style makes all websites more dark themed by changing as much text and as many borders as possible to gray and makes the Jupyter Notebook localhost server more dark as well. However, this *only* works if you invert all colors on your display first.

data.name: More Light Mode
data.description: This style makes all websites more light themed including the Jupyter Notebook localhost server.

data.name: Boursorama - I am not a tablet
data.description:
Shrink some elements on clients.boursorama.com (new UI as of March 2016).
Because bank thinks that everyone is using its fat dirty fingers on a tablet, lazily lied in a couch.
This style tries to render the site usable again with a mouse and a brain.

data.name: NitroType Customizable Theme
data.description:
This theme let's you choose whatever color you want for your button colors and some font colors and also your background image. The default colors will be approximately what they would be without any theme. You may be able to customize more with this theme in the future  so check back for updates.

How to customize your theme: (note: Please use the "Stylus" extension and not the "Stylish" one when using this theme. It is hard/impossible to use customizable themes with stylish. Install stylus for chrome here https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/stylus/clngdbkpkpeebahjckkjfobafhncgmne?hl=en-GB)
1. Install  the  theme
2. Reload the page and if the button you clicked to install the theme now says "Update Style" on it then you can continue to step 3. If not reload again until it does show that.
3. Click the "Customize Settings" button and choose your colors and/or background image and  then click "Update Style" 
Done!

My NT profile is https://www.nitrotype.com/racer/ethanmast

data.name: VK Design Fix
Soundcloud  Youppi Tralala
Webtoon spacing fix
data.description:
Gets rid of 5px gap between webtoon images so there's no unsightly split in the middle of the webtoon art, as well as ad blocks in the middle of the strip.
For use on https://mangakakalot.com and https://manganelo.com, and any other manga site that copies their specific CSS styles.

data.name: Corvid Darkmode ( MONOKAI )
data.description: This stylish will change the color of the code editor in the wix site
